mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.model_name modelName, a.model_content modelContent, a.model_text modelText, a.model_type modelType, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM code_model_history b WHERE b.model_id = a.id) useNum, CONCAT_WS('_', d.job_number, d.user_name) createName, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime, CONCAT_WS('_', e.job_number, e.user_name) lastUpdateName, CONVERT(a.last_update_time, char) lastUpdateTime FROM code_model a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff d ON a.create_id = d.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff e ON a.last_update_id = e.user_id WHERE a.group_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT into code_model (id, group_id, model_name, model_content, model_text, model_type, create_id, create_time, last_update_id, last_update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{groupId}, #{modelName}, #{modelContent}, #{modelText}, #{modelType}, #{createId}, #{createTime}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.model_name modelName, a.model_content modelContent, a.model_text modelText, a.model_type modelType FROM code_model a WHERE a.id = #{id}
